name: Fable of the Three Caves
description:
To open the mighty door, you must travel to three caves, each more mysterious than the last, and bring back three mysteriously and conveniently color coded keys. 

Controls:

  • wasd to move
  • mouse to look around
  • right click to pick up items / talk to npcs
  • e to advance text
  • left click to use an item
  • 0 to reset a scene if you get stuck
  • Esc to escape

If you liked the game, you can donate! if you donate 2 dollars or more you can download the wonderful OST by the wonderful wonderboi!

The Fable of The Three Caves was a design experiment where Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, and Austin Heller each made a level for a game without the others knowing anything about it until they were all done. There was a shared codebase, as well as several shared textures created by Anna Zelisko, The goal of this experiment was to help keep the game fresh to us and to have a fun reveal at the end where we all got to play each other's levels. It was also interesting to see the different design decisions the three of us made. 

Thanks for playing!
